# locale

**Instance Property**

The locale.

## Declaration

```swift
var locale: Locale { get set }
```

## Getting the Properties

- **dateFormatStyle**: The date format style.
- **floatingPointFormatStyle**: The floating point format style.
- **includesColumnTypes**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the description includes the column types.
- **integerFormatStyle**: The integer format style.
- **maximumCellWidth**: The largest number of characters a description can generate per cell.
- **maximumLineWidth**: The largest number of characters a description can generate per line.
- **maximumRowCount**: The largest number of rows a description can generate.
